## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                          | Type                                        | Default    |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `activeClass` | `active-class` | Class added to elements marked with `data-shell-active="your-route"` | `string`                                    | `'active'` |
| `routeData`   | --             | Route data keyed by route key. Will be passed as route data.         | `{ [x: string]: Record<string, unknown>; }` | `{}`       |

### `cleanup() => Promise<void>`
